game.control

Class PlayerMP

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.logic.Player
      • game.control.PlayerMP

  • public class PlayerMP
extends Player
    This class should do the multiplayer connecting side, player logic should be left to Player.java.
    Author:
    Cameron Bryers 300326848 MMXV

      PlayerMP(java.lang.String username, java.net.InetAddress ipAddress, int port)
      Creates a player with its position and rotation defaulted to (0, 0, 0).

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerMP

        public PlayerMP(java.lang.String username,
                double x,
                double y,
                double rotation,
                java.net.InetAddress ipAddress,
                int port)
        Default constructor, creates a Player that can be sent over the server.
        Parameters:
        username - - username of the player
        x - - player's x position (Tile x, Renderer x)
        y - - player's y position (Tile y, Renderer z)
        rotation - - players rotation around: (Tile z) (Renderer y)
        ipAddress - - IP address of client
        port - - port of client

      • PlayerMP

                int port)
        Creates a player with its position and rotation defaulted to (0, 0, 0).
        Parameters:
        username - - username of the player
        ipAddress - - IP address of client
        port - - port of client
